page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: People in the area can enjoy a wide variety of leisure activities.Football is popular with two junior club grounds,many pitches in different parts of the town together with school pitches.Community centres,schools and church halls provide the venue for cubs,scouts,brownies,guides,youth clubs,judo,boxing,dancing,ballet,hocke y,netball,badminton,table tennis,chess and gymnastics mostly for children and teenagers.The older people are not forgotten--lunch clubs,indoor games,bowls,dominoes and whist.Classes in pottery,art,crafts,woodwork ,metalwork,dressmaking,cookery, together with more academic classes in languages,history,modern studies are held in the secondary schools during the winter.Archery, the ancient sport from 1488 is practised in McGAVIN PARK .
